metadata.title: CVE-2018-7753 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bleach 2.1.x before 2.1.3. Attributes that have URI values weren't properly sanitized if the values contained character entities. Using character entities, it was possible to construct a URI value with a scheme that was not allowed that would slide through unsanitized.

criterions.comment: python-bleach package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.1-2').
